skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calming thunder
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Calming Thunder plays music at 174 Hz frequency and is a frequency believed to reduce pain, enhance emotional power, and improve concentration. This mixes in with thunderstorm sounds recorded in the United States and Italy.

WHY CHOOSE RELAXING SLEEP SOUNDS: RAIN MUSIC 

- 5 hours of enhanced looping included FREE!
- High-Quality Stereo audio included for FREE!

GOLD EDITION
- Loop free audio that plays through the entire night
- Premium sound quality
- Super Enhanced looping: 10-hour audio

FREE VERSION
- 5+ hour audio (most free skills offer 1 hour)
- Loop setting
- High-Quality Stereo Audio

GETTING STARTED:
- Enable this skill by clicking the yellow enable button above and then say, "Alexa, open rain music."

THE SOUNDS
This audio was custom created for this Alexa skill by Chase Baker. It is designed to promote peace, tranquility, healing, and concentration. The rain was professionally recorded in the Amazon rainforest in Brazil. 

Please consider rating Relaxing Sleep sounds. If you have any sound recommendations, feedback, or questions, please contact me at relaxingsleep.alexa@gmail.com.

If you enjoy this Sleep Sound Skill, please check out my others!
